description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Implement, Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+13 vs Reflex; 2d4+5 necrotic damage.

At-Will ✦ Implement, Necrotic

Standard

Close burst 1

+15 vs AC; 1d8+8 necrotic damage, and the target is pushed 1 square.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Cold, Implement, Necrotic

Standard

Area burst 2 within 10

+13 vs Fortitude; 2d8+8 cold and necrotic damage. Area is filled with swarming spirits until the end of Kravak's next turn: it grants concealment, and any creature that starts its turn in the area takes 5 cold and necrotic damage. Kravak can end this effect as a minor action.

Encounter ✦ Cold, Conjuration, Implement, Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+13 vs Reflex; 2d8+8 cold and necrotic damage, and a spectral hand grabs the target. If the target attempts to escape, the hand uses Kravak's Fortitude or Reflex defense. Sustain minor: A grabbed target takes 1d8+8 cold and necrotic damage when Kravak sustains the power. As a standard action, Kravak can attack another target with the hand, but it must release a target it has grabbed.

Encounter

Minor

The tiefling's next attack against a target that hit him since his last turn gains a +1 power bonus to the attack roll and pushes the target 1 square if it hits.
A tiefling gains a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls against bloodied foes.

Daily

Minor

Kravak gains resist 10 to all damage until the start of his next turn.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

Kravat spends a healing surge and regains 50 hit points. He gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of his next turn.

system.biography:
HP 200; Bloodied 100
Resist 10 fire, 10 necrotic 		Init +7 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 27Fort 21Ref 27Will 24
Speed 6
Ability ScoresStr 10 (+5)
Con 12 (+6)		Dex 14 (+7)
Int 20 (+10)		Wis 14 (+7)
Cha 14 (+7)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +15, Bluff +9, Stealth +9Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 17 | Insight 17

Equipment cloak of resistance +3 .
